ygData.subject: Gladiator on 1 ghz & other
ygData.msgSnippet: So far I am able to run gladiator on speed setting 8 on my 1 ghz PC wihtout having problems moving around while enjoying the cool sound effects.  That is the

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

So far I am able to run gladiator on speed setting 8 on my 1 ghz PC 
wihtout having problems moving around while enjoying the cool sound 
effects.  That is the same speed setting I used for my 100 mhz 
computer.  Any comments about that from the gladiator programmers?

I am thinking about redoing my mega-gold scenario into a beginning 
scenario and adding a few others as a prequel to my normal scenarios.

The mega-gold scenario contains all $$$$ you should need to buy/equip 
your team.  All I would need do is add few scenarios to help build up 
the experience to the point of handling 'The Brag'.  Any thoughts 
about how many scenarios I would need to go from mega-gold to 'The 
Brag'?

Yep, I do plan on start creating new scenarios pretty soon as in 
months.
